Topic.Title: my city adventure wip (call for help)

Posts.EditableText: if people have seen my most recent creation fully interactive city wip. as it says in the description i am looking for people to  help me make the game because i know it is difficult to make a massive game alone. so  i decided why not bring the community together to build a game together , where almost anything can happen, if anyone is intrested comment here and i will give you more info, i hope to see around 3-5 people to start of with.  and for anyone who even reads this post and finds it a little interesting i thank you    p.s i will not be a story based game unless something happens otherwise

How massive is this game? And in what sense? I love making open world (sandbox) games. Though i have a project of my own to work on right now (the story of MLJesus) I would be glad to lend a hand.
